Case# BAErrorCode.downloadBackgroundActivityProhibited

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 17.0+macOS 14.0+tvOS 18.4+visionOS 2.4+

```
case downloadBackgroundActivityProhibited
```
